1_messenger_text.message:
More than one feature... It is the Sidebar.
Facebook Messenger, Telegram, Skype and Zalo are all integrated on the sidebar for your extra convenience. Go chat now!

1_skype_text.message:
More than one feature... It is the Sidebar.
Facebook Messenger, Telegram, Skype and Zalo are all integrated on the sidebar for your extra convenience. Go chat now!

1_tele_text.message:
More than one feature... It is the Sidebar.
Facebook Messenger, Telegram, Skype and Zalo are all integrated on the sidebar for your extra convenience. Go chat now!

1_translate_text.message:
Find languages hard? Let sidebar help you
Open Google Translate in sidebar window to translate languages 2x faster. Just one click to access, no need to switch between multiple tabs.

1_youtube_text.message:
Smooth like sidebar - Stay groovy with music
Add YouTube to the sidebar to find and play your favorite music videos right away!

1_zalo_text.message:
More than one feature... It is the Sidebar.
Facebook Messenger, Telegram, Skype and Zalo are all integrated on the sidebar for your extra convenience. Go chat now!

appDescription.message: Helps you download video, audio files instantly from any website.

chatgpt_desc_text.message:
Catch up with the AI trend with Cốc Cốc Sidebar and ChatGPT
With a click, you can immediately meet the intelligent virtual chatbot in the Sidebar. Not only that, you can surf the web and chat with ChatGPT at the same time.

instant_actions_download_options.description: Options text for instant download button
instant_actions_download_options.message: Show Download button for YouTube on search engine result pages

instant_actions_download_tooltip.description: Tooltip for download in one click button
instant_actions_download_tooltip.message: Download YouTube video in one click

mobile_error_text.description: Text for error in mobile transfer panel

mobile_panel_footer.message: You haven't downloaded Cốc Cốc Mobile yet?

onboard_youtube_antiadblocker_desc.message: Currently, YouTube does not allow the use of adblockers. In order to watch videos, please try pausing our adblocker by following the instructions below:

onboarding_coccoctv_descText_varA.message:
Bạn muốn xem bóng đá trên màn hình lớn hơn?

Tải trình duyệt Cốc Cốc TV cho Android TV và truy cập mọi trang web.

onboarding_coccoctv_descText_varB.message:
Bạn có muốn... lên TV?

Tình yêu bóng đá to mà màn hình này thì nhỏ. Mở Android TV và tải Cốc Cốc để xem cho đã!

onboarding_coccoctv_movie_descText_varA.message:
Bạn muốn xem phim trên màn hình lớn hơn?

Tải ngay Cốc Cốc cho Android TV để có trải nghiệm xem phim mượt mà, không quảng cáo.

onboarding_coccoctv_movie_descText_varB.message:
Bạn có muốn... lên TV?

Tình yêu phim ảnh to mà màn hình này thì nhỏ. Mở Android TV và tải Cốc Cốc để xem cho đã!

onboarding_new_mp_desc_1.message: You can download those files for free, 8 times faster than other browsers

onboarding_new_mp_desc_2.message: You can watch the video and use other apps at the same time

onboarding_new_mp_desc_3.message: Thanks to Cốc Cốc's automatic adblock, you can enjoy videos without being disturbed

onboarding_new_mp_title_2.message: Pin video in a floating window

options_one_click.description: Download in one click checkbox label

options_prefer_last_quality.description: Prefer last quality as initial quality selector checkbox label

options_show_detach_button.message: Show Pin video button on media panel

options_show_on_page_buttons.message: Show media panel next to downloadable media files

options_site_hide_widget_list_title.message: Websites that do not show Media panel

options_site_popup_desc.message: The media panel will not show on these websites

options_site_popup_input_helper_error_du.message: This domain is already in the list

options_skip_ads.message: Automatically skip ads when playing videos

options_skip_ads_desc.message: Cốc Cốc will helps you automatically click the Skip ads button on Youtube videos that allow skipping

pip_failed_to_find.description: Notice to show when we failed to locate player on the page.

pip_tour_content.description: PiP tour text - ask the user to try our product
pip_tour_content.message: You can download audio files into an mp3 separately from the video.

pip_tour_title.message: Download mp3 in just one click

play_now_click_to_play.message: Click Play now to watch downloaded video in a floating window, even when you close the tab.

play_now_do_not_show.description: Do not show tooltip again text

popup_check_label.description: Label to check all or none

popup_download_failed.description: Message is shown if download could not be started.
popup_download_failed.message: Download has failed to start. Try with different format or quality.

popup_how_many_media_found.description: Text saying how many media was found.

popup_no_media_found.description: Message shows in popup if there is no media to display.

popup_one_click.description: Download in one click checkbox label

popup_preferred_quality_hint.description: Preferred media quality as a hint for automatic download.

popup_sound_only.description: Sound only text for quality selection

popup_welcome_text.message: If you see this icon in the address-bar, this means that there is media content on the page (like music, video clips or movies), which can be downloaded.

promote_serp_desc.message: Dear CocCoc-er, please try to use our search engine for this query and report problems if any – it will be a great help in improving our search quality.

widget_downloading_media.description: Message shows in widget when media is downloading

widget_no_media_found.description: Message shows in popup if there is no media to display.

widget_other_options.description: Message shows in widget when user hover on three dots button

widget_panel_hidden.message: Panel hidden (Reload page to show this panel)

widget_panel_hidden_on_site.message: The media panel will not reappear on $1. Please go to Settings to enable it again.
